get.description:
Search for places in the FSQ Places database using a location and querying by name, category name, taste label, or chain name. For example, search for "coffee" to get back a list of recommended coffee shops. You must pass a location with your request by using one of the following options:
  • ll & radius (circular boundary)
  • near (geocodable locality)
  • ne & sw (rectangular boundary)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A string to be matched against all content for this place, including but not limited to venue name, category, taste, and tips.

parameters.name: ll
parameters.description: The latitude/longitude around which to retrieve place information. This must be specified as latitude,longitude (e.g., ll=41.8781,-87.6298). One of ll, ne and sw, or near must be specified.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Defines the distance (in meters) within which to bias place results. The maximum allowed radius is 100,000 meters.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Filters the response and returns FSQ Places matching the specified categories. Supports multiple Category IDs, separated by commas. For a complete list of Foursquare Category IDs, refer to the Category Taxonomy page.

parameters.name: chains
parameters.description: Filters the response and returns FSQ Places matching the specified chains. Supports multiple chain IDs, separated by commas.

parameters.name: exclude_chains
parameters.description: Filters the response by only returning FSQ Places that are not known to be part of any chain.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Indicate which fields to return in the response, separated by commas. If no fields are specified, all Core Fields are returned by default. For a complete list of returnable fields, refer to the Response Fields page.

parameters.name: ne
parameters.description: The latitude/longitude representing the north/east points of a rectangle. Must be used with sw parameter to specify a rectangular search box. One of ll, ne and sw, or near must be specified.

parameters.name: sw
parameters.description: The latitude/longitude representing the south/west points of a rectangle. Must be used with ne parameter to specify a rectangular search box. One of ll, ne and sw, or near must be specified.

parameters.name: near
parameters.description: A string naming a locality in the world (e.g., "Chicago, IL"). If the value is not geocodable, returns an error. One of ll, ne and sw, or near must be specified.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Specifies the order in which results are listed. Possible values are:
  • relevance (default)
  • >rating
  • distance

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return, up to 50. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: session_token
parameters.description: A user-generated token to identify a session for billing purposes. Learn more about [session tokens](https://docs.foursquare.com/reference/session-tokens).
